common.title: snaxx - Web Agency
common.keywords: Web agency, Website, Branding, Business development, Social network, Web3
common.mission_txt: To refresh digital experiences so that companies can inspire their community and grow further.
common.process_head_txt: We develop ambitious and creative projects to enable your business to create value and make a difference. We are offering you a unique experience through a unique working process.
common.process_txt_1: The investigation phase allows us to get to know each other. Our team go through your history, your goals and your growth strategies. The main objective is to find the strength and weaknesses of your company to make sure our collaboration will be a success. We leave nothing to chance. We hope you love coffees. We will share several of them.
common.process_txt_2: Now that we know more about you, it's time to define our monthly goals together. We take into account your teams, your budget and the specificities of your market. Our goal is to create ambitious and achievable goals. Once again, we will need to share some caffeine.
common.process_subtitle_3: It's time to make a difference.
common.process_txt_3: Once we have set the course, we introduce our roadmap point by point to unlock the digital potential of your brand. As the project progresses, we evolve our roadmap and your objectives to take into account the lessons learned.

index.title: 360 Marketing Agency
index.purpose_text: We are snaxx — a Paris based creative digital agency, partnering with visionary companies to design, develop and launch impactful brand experiences on the web.

detail.lets_talk_text_1: Our teams love to explore new horizons and to help entrepreneurs and companies to drive a new era of creativity and experiences.
detail.lets_talk_text_2: Tell us more about your project and let’s work together to inspire your community and improve your performances.

form.name: Your name
form.topic: What can we do for you?

talisman.page_title: Talisman by snaxx - it's time to make your turnover shine
talisman.page_description: Talisman by snaxx, The only digital marketing offer specialised in jewellery. We develop content and acquisition strategies that drive revenue for your jewellery brand.
talisman.description1: We develop content and acquisition strategies that drive revenue for your jewellery brand.
talisman.description2: The only digital marketing offer specialised in jewellery.
talisman.issues_description: We are aware of the problems you face on a daily basis.
talisman.carousel1_item3: We have a lot of traffic but few sales.
talisman.carousel1_item4: Creating qualitative contents take too much time.
talisman.carousel1_item5: SEO is too complicated for us.
talisman.carousel2_item1: We have great content but no engagement.
talisman.carousel2_item4: We don't have a content strategy.
talisman.carousel2_item5: Posting daily content is too difficult.
talisman.carousel3_item1: We have a lot of traffic but few sales.
talisman.carousel4_item1: Our advertising campaigns are not profitable.
talisman.carousel4_item2: We are struggling to target the right people.
talisman.carousel4_item3: We can't create creative that converts.
talisman.carousel4_item4: We don't know how to structure our advertising campaigns.
talisman.profit_item1_description: No it's not a dream. It's what you get when youn rank#1 on Google.
talisman.profit_item2_description: It's easier with the right acquisition and content strategy.
talisman.profit_item3_description: We create CTA that engage. Your community will love you.
talisman.profit_item4_description: Our goal is to maximize your sales and therefore your happiness.
talisman.steps1_description: We only open 3 spots per month to support jewellery brands. This allows us to offer you tailor-made support and to achieve results as quickly as possible.
talisman.steps2_description: Does your company sell jewellery? You have been in the market between 1 and 5 years? Do you sell your products on your own website? Are you highly motivated to move to the next level?
talisman.steps3_title: It's a match. Let's get to work!
talisman.steps3_description: Benefit from the experience of our teams. After working at LVMH and L'Oréal, we decided to help companies like yours to make your turnover shine in the long term. You deserve happiness.
talisman.anim_description2: It's time to make it to the next level.
talisman.faq_a1: We have one goal: to make your brand shine. To achieve this, our teams need to be 100% dedicated to the success of your business. So we can't take care of everyone.
talisman.faq_a2: The price of our services depends on your needs.
talisman.faq_a3: 10.000€, 100.000€, 1.000.000€? It is very difficult to say. Until we have met and started to analyse your company, we are not in a position to give you any figures.
talisman.faq_a4: Depending on your needs, we will set goals together. If we don't reach them, we will continue to work for you free of charge until your goals are achieved.
talisman.faq_a5: Digital enthusiasts guided by one mission: to reinvent your business to bring your dreams to life.
